title: Level 70 Glorious Capsule
body: Hello Riot. I just leveled up to level 70 and i got the notification that i got the glorious champion capsule. After checking the loot tab and relogging twice, the capsule doesn't appear on my loot tab. Can you please fix it?

replies.body: This is a known serverside issue right now, i assume there will be a fix in the near future to deliver all the missing loot.
Nice, I'm glad they know about it :) Thank you for the information
